MESSAGE.name: PixImage.bad_color_size
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Pixel size too small for color image

MESSAGE.name: PixImage.bad_hstretchraw
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Unable to stretch this image type

MESSAGE.name: PixImage.bad_rowsize
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Image row size is too small for data

MESSAGE.name: PixImage.bad_upsample
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Incorrect upsample or pixel size value

MESSAGE.name: PixImage.data_size
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Internal error: data is outside allocated region
